body:
Half-Elf Siblings
d%Result
01—201d2 half-siblings (either elf or human, your choice). With two or more siblings, you gain access to the Kin Guardian combat trait.
21—30One half-elf sibling. You gain access to the Kin Bond magic trait.
31—100No siblings.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 1-Homeland/Family/and Childhood/Half-Elf/Half-Elf Siblings
name: Half-Elf Siblings
